metadata.description: A marketplace for the Codebase Visualizer skill - transform any codebase into interactive visual HTML guides with up to 7 tabs

plugins.name: codebase-visualizer
plugins.description: Transform any codebase into an interactive visual HTML guide with up to 7 tabs: story mode, architecture, how-to, data flow, quality metrics, key features, and database schema. Bilingual CN/EN support.
